pages.text: soganda che akasana ane ratamam pragata thanarana
tamane khabara pana che ke te ratamam pragata thanara sum che
te camakato taro che
ko'i (jiva) evo nathi jena upara dekharekha rakhanara (pharista) na hoya
manavi'e jovum jo'i'e ke te ka'i vastuthi peda karavamam avyo che
te eka uchalata panithi peda karavamam avyo che
je pitha ane chati vaccethi nikale che
cokkasapane te (allaha) tene pharivara lavava para saktimana che
je divase gupta rahasyoni tapasa thase
to nahim hoya teni pase kami sakti, na sahayaka
varasadavala akasana soganda
ane phatavavali jaminana soganda
vastavamam a (kura'ana) sampurna phesalo karavavalo kalama che
a thaththa-majaka (phayada vagarani) vata nathi
kharekhara inkari'o yukti kari rahya che
ane hum pana eka yukti kari rahyo chum
tu inkari'one samaya apa, temane thodaka divasa chodi de
potana sarvocca palanaharana namani pavitrata bayana kara
jene sarjana karyu ane thika-thaka karyo
ane jene (thika-thaka) bhagya banavyum ane pachi marga batavyo
ane jene taji vanaspati'o upajavi
pachi tene tene (sukavine) kalo kacaro banavi didho
ame tamane padhavisu pachi tame nahim bhulo
sivaya je kami allaha icche, te jahera ane chupi (vatone pana) jane che
Ame tamara mate saralata peda kari da'isum
to tame sikhamana apata raho, jo sikhamana labhadayaka hoya
daravavalo to sikhamana grahana karase
(ha) durbhagi tenathi dura rahese
je moti agamam jase
tyam na to te mrtyu pamase na to jivase. (Jana-kanini avasthamam hase)
kharekhara tene saphalata prapta kari je pavitra tha'i gayo
ane jene potana palanaharana namanum smarana karyu, ane namajha padhato rahyo
